metadata.title: CVE-2024-8384 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The JavaScript garbage collector could mis-color cross-compartment objectsif OOM conditions were detected at the right point between two passes. Thiscould have led to memory corruption. This vulnerability affects Firefox <130, Firefox ESR < 128.2, Firefox ESR < 115.15, Thunderbird < 128.2, andThunderbird < 115.15.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
